comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Samuel T. "Sam" Frear [photographer] (1931-2008) graduated with a bachelor's degree in journalism and with a master's degree in history both from the University of Oregon. He worked as a reporter for the Honolulu Advertiser and for The Eugene Register-Guard. He worked as a public information officer for Willamette National Forest [U.S. Forest Service] from 1966 to 1983. [1]
